channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Summer Styles with Frank Usher
channel.desc: Summer Styles with Frank Usher.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories by Kipling
channel.desc: Showcasing the fashionable and classic bags created by this international brand, including handbags, rucksacks, travel bags and weekend away bags.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Osprey London
channel.desc: Fall in love with Osprey London's leather goods in this show, from beautiful bags to wow-worthy wallets. Perfect gifts for loved ones or yourself, you're sure to discover something you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion
channel.desc: Fashion: Whilst Stocks Last.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Alfresco Living
channel.desc: Shop outdoor living accents ranging from traditional to contemporary, with our Alfresco Living show devoted to stylish seating, ambient lighting, striking plants and more.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Osprey London
channel.desc: Fall in love with Osprey London's leather goods in this show, from beautiful bags to wow-worthy wallets. Perfect gifts for loved ones or yourself, you're sure to discover something you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: White Stuff
channel.desc: Discover White Stuff in this show, featuring inspired fashion that combines eclectic prints, flattering shapes and fresh designs. Update your wardrobe with pieces you'll wear again and again.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion
channel.desc: Fashion: Whilst Stocks Last.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Crocs Footwear
channel.desc: That's right, Crocs has launched at QVC! Discover the iconic footwear brand and stay light on your feet with shoes that feel oh-so-comfortable. Marvellously modern.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Seasalt Cornwall Fashion
channel.desc: Founded in Penzance, Cornwall in 1981, Seasalt offer high quality, functional and timelessly styling clothing to complement your wardrobe throughout the year.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Free Spirit Footwear
channel.desc: Want to update your footwear collection? Then look no further than the Free Spirit footwear range, will comfortable, stylish shoes that will keep your feet happy every day.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: de Jager Bulbs & Plants
channel.desc: First established over 150 years ago, join reputable gardening brand de Jager as they share high quality plants and bulbs in all shapes and sizes, to help you create your dream outdoor space.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Light Up Your Garden with Luxform
channel.desc: Luxform are renowned for their innovative creations in lighting designed to complement and enhance your outdoor living space.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Perfect Patio
channel.desc: Elevate your garden with Perfect Patio & Container Gardening! Discover vibrant plants and creative ideas to transform your garden into a springtime haven. Be the first to explore our new offerings.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Emma's Cottage Garden
channel.desc: Create your very own cottage garden with expert tips and advice from QVC's garden expert Emma Real-Davies to bring the charm of cottage gardening to your outdoor space.
